title: Set emergency ownership reset code to 73024141

requirements.text: Update the backend emergency ownership reset authorization key so that calling emergencyResetOwnership only succeeds when the provided reset code equals "73024141".

quotes: Add owner ship reset code code is 73024141

acceptanceCriteria: In backend/main.mo, the constant used by emergencyResetOwnership is set to "73024141".
Calling emergencyResetOwnership("73024141") succeeds and sets currentOwner to null and ownershipClaimable to true.
Calling emergencyResetOwnership with any other code continues to trap with "Unauthorized: Invalid emergency reset code".

constraints: Do not edit files under frontend/src/components/ui or any paths listed as immutable in SYSTEM_CONTEXT.
nonGoals: Do not change the ownership reset UI layout or wording.
Do not add new authentication mechanisms or third-party integrations.
Do not change the post-reset authorization model beyond the reset code value.
